languages.text: {n}Соломон веско добавляет:{/n} "Но это совсем не значит, что вы мне неприятны, Вольный Торговец".
{n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон веско добавляет:{/n} "Но это совсем не значит, что вы мне неприятны, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I dislike you, Rogue Trader. Far from it."

{n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."
{n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: « Mais ça ne veut pas dire que je ne vous apprécie pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, » {n}ajoute Solomorne sur un ton sérieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ça ne veut pas dire que je ne vous apprécie pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, » {n}ajoute Solomorne sur un ton sérieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは少し重みのある口調で付け加えた。{/n}「ですが、だからといってあなたに嫌悪感を抱いているわけではありませんよ。ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは少し重みのある口調で付け加えた。{/n}「ですが、だからといってあなたに嫌悪感を抱いているわけではありませんよ。ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne añade con gravedad:{/n} «Eso no significa que me desagrade usted, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne añade con gravedad:{/n} «Eso no significa que me desagrade usted, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙立刻严肃地补充道。{/n}“不过，我这么说并不意味着我对你有任何不满，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙立刻严肃地补充道。{/n}“不过，我这么说并不意味着我对你有任何不满，行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Bu, sizden hoşlanmadığım anlamına gelmez Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Bu, sizden hoşlanmadığım anlamına gelmez Hür Tacir."

languages.text: {n}Dann fügt Solomorne feierlich hinzu:{/n} "Aber das heißt nicht, dass ich irgendeine Abneigung gegen Euch empfinde, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne adds with some gravity,{/n} "But that doesn't mean I have any distaste for you, Rogue Trader."
